description:
Yuru Yuri`s protagonist Akaza Akari here!! Yuri Yuri has returned to TV!
Since summer vacation is over and school is starting, I hope to have lots of fun with the members of the Amusement Club! Now let`s head to the club room!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Et là, maintenant, place au fun
It Is the Beginning of Amusement
Sore wa, Sunawachi, Goraku no Hajimari
それは, すなわち, 娯楽の始まり
